name: Match Team
description:
Simple Lem, an Everyman with crazy ideal standards has been captured by the mad scientist Croff mantis, who has started a new kind of experiment where the user(in this case Lem) is strapped to a beam, forced to do virtual match-3 on different sketches. The nerd crow appears in various sketches as a sort of literature guide. Help Lem get through all sketches to leave fair and square.

Your device is incomplete. Go to purplecade+ now and play at no additional cost
